summary: Repalces all 5 differebt body types textures in an unique REAL furball body texture.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces all 5 dfferent types of body textures available in S.A.M. ([url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/file/1-sam-shape-atlas-for-men-recoded/]Shape Atlas for Men[/url] required) in an unique REAL FURBALL body texture.
It affects human races only (so not khajiit, argonian. werewolves and vampire lord ones).


Please Note: These are 4K Textures. If anyone ask me I can reduce to 2K and/or 1K too.

Ibstallation:
NMM: Answer "NO" and "YES TO ALL" when asked.

Manual: Overwrite the files when asked.
(Reinstall S.A.M. proper textures to bring back to the original state)

All credits go to:
Vectorplexus and MysticBinary82


To bend the genitals for player and NPC too as in SOS
Use B3lisario [url=http://pan.baidu.com/s/1iWgMm]SOS - Schlongs controller[/url] (click on blue square to download it)

Have "hairy" fun! ^_^
author: Tiranno71
